nodes.text: Pupa was a term used at least on Rimbaux Four to describe an Ithorian youth prior to its metamorphosis.

Pupa was first mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical. Pupa was later made canonical with the publishing of Musings of an Ithorian on Hyperspace.
